p: Regarding the land cover, most of the site’s surroundings were SNH (42.6% ± 20.6) followed by mass flowering crops ( Lavandula hybrida, Salvia sclarea, Helichrysum italicum; 24.6% ± 18.8) and then by other crops (12.9% ± 8.7). The other land cover types represented less than 5% of the remaining area within our buffers.
